subject: Basketball
NBA Championship
lead_paragraph: The Heat, facing a 2-1 deficit in the N.B.A. finals against the Spurs, ultimately rise and fall based on the strength, talent and poise of LeBron James, their star and leader.
snippet: The Heat, facing a 2-1 deficit in the N.B.A. finals against the Spurs, ultimately rise and fall based on the strength, talent and poise of LeBron James, their star and leader.
